Selection Sort 
 
 
The Algorithm: 
 
Find the smallest element in the list 
Put it in the first place 
Now the first element is sorted 
Find the next smallest element 
Put it in the second place 
Now the first two elements are sorted 
Keep doing this until all the elements are sorted 
 
 
Fun Facts: 
 
*This sort, like insertion sort, 
 is one of the slower sorts 
*Each element in the list is checked twice 
 when sorting
